amendment.description: To require a GAO report on employment discrimination complaints relating to employment in airport screener positions in the Transportation Security Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3603 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3603 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S9194-9195; text: CR S9194) To require a GAO report on employment discrimination complaints relating to employment in airport screener positions in the Transportation Security Administration.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3603 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3603 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Landrieu.
